member.summary: The opaque value used by the client to maintain context info between the authentication request and the IDP callback.

member.summary: The birth date of the IdP account.

member.summary: The display name of the user.

member.summary: The email returned by the IdP. NOTE: The federated login user may not own the email.

member.summary: It's true if the email is recycled.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.EmailVerified
member.summary: The value is true if the IDP is also the email provider. It means the user owns the email.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.FederatedId
member.summary: The unique ID identifies the IdP account.

member.summary: The first name of the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.FullName
member.summary: The full name of the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.InputEmail
member.summary: It's the identifier param in the createAuthUri request if the identifier is an email. It can be used to check whether the user input email is different from the asserted email.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.Language
member.summary: The language preference of the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.LastName
member.summary: The last name of the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.LocalId
member.summary: The RP local ID if it's already been mapped to the IdP account identified by the federated ID.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.NeedConfirmation
member.summary: Whether the assertion is from a non-trusted IDP and need account linking confirmation.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.NickName
member.summary: The nick name of the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.OauthRequestToken
member.summary: The user approved request token for the OpenID OAuth extension.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.OauthScope
member.summary: The scope for the OpenID OAuth extension.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.OriginalEmail
member.summary: The original email stored in the mapping storage. It's returned when the federated ID is associated to a different email.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.PhotoUrl
member.summary: The URI of the public accessible profiel picture.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.ProviderId
member.summary: The IdP ID. For white listed IdPs it's a short domain name e.g. google.com, aol.com, live.net and yahoo.com. If the "providerId" param is set to OpenID OP identifer other than the whilte listed IdPs the OP identifier is returned. If the "identifier" param is federated ID in the createAuthUri request. The domain part of the federated ID is returned.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyAssertionResponse.VerifiedProvider
member.summary: When action is 'map', contains the idps which can be used for confirmation.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyPasswordResponse.Email
member.summary: The email returned by the IdP. NOTE: The federated login user may not own the email.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyPasswordResponse.IdToken
member.summary: The GITKit token for authenticated user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyPasswordResponse.LocalId
member.summary: The RP local ID if it's already been mapped to the IdP account identified by the federated ID.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.IdentityToolkit.v3.Data.VerifyPasswordResponse.PhotoUrl
member.summary: The URI of the user's photo at IdP
